issue.title: [C++/Python] Run lint checks in Travis CI to fail for linting issues as early as possible
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1578](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1578). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The lint checks are run relatively late in the CI process, and a build may fail after holding a worker for ~20 minutes or more. These could fail much sooner and free up build slaves
